configuration.title: Processing Nutrients
configuration.stem: Choose two body systems that you think are working together in the processes described below.

feedBack.firstWrongHint: Think about what each system does and how that might relate to each function.
feedBack.finalWrongHint: The teeth and muscles in the mouth help chew the food. The muscular and digestive systems work together to move the food into the body and through the digestive system. Nutrients are absorbed by the circulatory system and delivered to all the cells in the body. The circulatory system also picks up waste products from digestion, which are filtered out of the body by the excretory system.

cells.label: movement of food through the body
